meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning halves or portions.
meanings.sent1: She shared the cake with her friend, each getting one of the haffs.
meanings.sent2: The haffs of the sandwich were perfectly cut and ready to eat.
meanings.sent3: The haffs of the pizza were so big, they barely fit on the plates!
meanings.sent4: The haffs of the map showed different routes to the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The haffs of the cookie were so delicious, she couldn't resist eating both.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to divide or split into two equal parts.
meanings.sent1: He carefully haffs the sandwich to share with his sister.
meanings.sent2: The chef haffs the ingredients before mixing them together.
meanings.sent3: The magician haffs the rope in a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: The teacher haffs the class into two groups for the activity.
meanings.sent5: She haffs the paper neatly before putting it in the folder.
